name: Lightning Strike
description: emits chain-lightning (4) when you damage a foe

name: Thunder Flourish
description: causes a lightning bolt to strike nearby foes

name: Electric Shot
description: burst of chain-lightning (5) that bounces between foes; lodges in enemies

name: Thunder Dash
description: causes a lightning bolt to strike nearby foes

name: Zeus's Aid
description: lightning strikes nearby foes repeatedly for 1.5s (max 9s)

name: Electric Flare
description: causes a lightning bolt to strike nearby foes

name: Static Discharge
description: lightning effects also cause jolted (next attack self-inflicts damage)

name: Storm Lightning
description: chain-lightning effects bounce more times before expiring

name: High Voltage
description: lightning bolt effects deal damage in a larger area

name: Double Strike
description: lightning bolt effects have a chance to strike twice

name: Heaven's Vengeance
description: ... your foe is struck by lightning

name: Lightning Reflexes
description: dash just before being hit to counter-attack with a lightning bolt

name: Clouded Judgment
description: god gauge charges faster when dealing or taking damage

name: Billowing Strength
description: after using your call, deal more damage for 15s

name: Tempest Strike
description: more damage and knock foes away

name: Tempest Flourish
description: more damage and knock foes away

name: Flood Shot
description: damages foes in an area and knocks them away; lodges in enemies

name: Tidal Dash
description: damages foes in an area and knocks them away

name: Poseidon's Aid
description: surge into foes while impervious for 1.2s (max 7.2s)

name: Flood Flare
description: damages foes around you and knocks them away

name: Razor Shoals
description: knock-away effects also cause rupture (take damage every 0.2s while moving)

name: Wave Pounding
description: boons with knock-away effects deal bonus damage to bosses

name: Typhoon's Fury
description: deal more damage when slamming foes into barriers

name: Breaking Wave
description: slamming foes into walls or corners creates a watery blast in the area which stuns

name: Rip Current (Call)
description: makes Poseidon's Aid last longer and pull foes in

name: Hydraulic Might
description: attack and special are stronger in the first 5 seconds of encounters

name: Boiling Point
description: god gauge charges faster when taking damage

name: Ocean's Bounty
description: any gems, darkness, or coin are worth more

name: Divine Strike
description: more damage and deflects

name: Divine Flourish
description: more damage and deflects

name: Phalanx Shot
description: damages foes in an area and deflects; lodges in enemies

name: Divine Dash
description: deals damage and deflects

name: Athena's Aid
description: makes you invulnerable and deflects all attacks

name: Phalanx Flare
description: damages foes around you and deflects

name: Blinding Flash
description: deflect also makes foes exposed for 5s (take more damage from behind)

name: Brilliant Riposte
description: when you deflect attacks, they deal more damage

name: Holy Shield
description: ... damage nearby foes and deflect

name: Bronze Skin
description: resist damage from foes' attacks

name: Sure Footing
description: resist damage from traps

name: Proud Bearing
description: begin each encounter with the god gauge partly full

name: Deathless Stand
description: death defiance makes you impervious longer replenish 1 charge

name: Last Stand
description: death defiance restores more health than usual replenish 1 charge

name: Curse of Agony
description: inflicts doom (1.1s)

name: Curse of Pain
description: inflicts doom (1.1s)

description: sends a blade rift (damage every 0.1s for 4s); does not lodge in enemies

name: Blade Dash
description: create a blade rift at start (damage every 0.1s for 0.7s)

name: Ares' Aid
description: turn into an invulnerable rift blade for 2.5s (max 15s)

name: Slicing Flare
description: sends a blade rift ahead for a brief time

name: Dire Misfortune
description: doom effects deal more damage when applied multiple times

name: Impending Doom
description: doom effects deal more damage, after +0.5s

name: Black Metal
description: blade rift deals damage in a wider area

name: Engulfing Vortex
description: blade rift lasts longer and pulls foes in

name: Curse of Vengeance

name: Urge to Kill

name: Battle Rage (K)

name: Hunter's Flare

name: Pressure Points

name: Clean Kill

name: Hide Breaker

name: Support Fire

name: Exit Wounds

description: more damage and inflict weak (-30% attack for 4s)

name: Passion Dash
description: inflict damage and weak at end of dash

name: Passion Flare

name: Broken Resolve

name: Wave of Despair
description: ... damage nearby foes and inflict weak

name: Different League

name: Dying Lament (K)
description: when floes are slain, damage nearby foes and inflict weak

name: Life Affirmation
description: any health increase rewards are worth more

description: inflicts hangover (stack 5, damage every 0.5s for 4s)

name: Drunken Flourish
description: inflicts hangover (stack 5, damage every 0.5s for 4s)

name: Trippy Shot
description: lobs a projectile that bursts into festive fog; does not lodge in enemies

name: Drunken Dash
description: inflicts hangover (stack 5, damage every 0.5s for 4s)

name: Dionysus's Aid
description: inflict hangover to all foes around you for 1.5s (max 9s)

name: Trippy Flare
description: damages foes around you leaving behind festive fog

description: more damage and chill (4% slow for 8s, stack 10)

name: Mistral Dash
description: shoot a gust ahead that inflicts chill

name: Icy Flare

name: Killing Freeze

name: Arctic Blast

name: Frozen Touch

name: Ravenous Will
